column1: * 1907 - J.R.R. Tolkien receives the book List of books in Tolkiens library#Dictionary in Englysshe and Welshe.
* 1921 - Voice actor Brian Haines is born.
* 1961 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Mr Hart.
* 1967 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Oscar Morland.
* 2007 - Previews of The Lord of the Rings Musical start in London.
